front.title: A Session Initiation Protocol (SIP) Reason Header extension for dynamic Incoming Communication Barring

abstract.t: The 3GPP, as part of the MITE work item, is defining the MultimediaTelephony service and other Supplementary services using the IPMultimedia Core Network framework. Supplementary services includeIncoming and Outgoing Communication Barring. This document describesa new set of procedures for Incoming Communication Barring to allowterminating users to dynamically block unwanted incomingcommunications. A new extension to SIP reason header is alsodescribed.
